content: this pattern is available for free on my blog at https //kickincrochet com/interlocking-crochet-square-january 1 or you may purchase a pdf copy of the pattern including the charts and written instructions this square is made using interlocking crochet in the round there is a complete video tutorial included and each round is timestamped so you know where in the video each round begins there are also two versions of the chart - one plain chart and one with markings showing when to do front vs back double crochets to create the design this square is the first square in a set that will be released one square per month for this entire year so if you d like to get updates about future releases sign up for my email list here 2 it would also make a great afghan on its own with the repeating quilt-like motifs i also sewed two squares together to make a thick woolly pot holder i have made this square in both wool of the andes worsted pictured and paintbox simply aran using a size h crochet hook for both squares in the worsted the square measures approximately 9 and in the aran the square measures approximately 10 1 https //kickincrochet com/interlocking-crochet-square-january 2 https //landing mailerlite com/webforms/landing/q0w9v2
